documentation.text:
@title Moderator mint
 @dev Contains functionality to handle mint for Moderators

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You can mint only once every day"

arguments.value: You can mint only once every day

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You can mint only once every day"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The amount exceed max daily mint"

arguments.value: The amount exceed max daily mint

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The amount exceed max daily mint"

documentation.text: @dev increment moderator supply if not exceed allowed daily amount and max supply
